## TiltViewClipPlanesEvaluator.getFrustumGroundIntersectionDist() method

Calculate the lengths of frustum planes intersection with the ground plane. This evaluates distances between eye vector (or eye plane in orthographic projection) and ground intersections of top and bottom frustum planes.  This method assumes the world surface (ground) to be flat and works only with planar projections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getFrustumGroundIntersectionDist(camera: THREE.Camera, projection: Projection): {
        top: number;
        bottom: number;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  camera | THREE.Camera | The \[\[THREE.Camera\]\] instance in use, |
|  projection | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) | The geo-projection used to convert geographic to world coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ top: number; bottom: number; }
